scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter '@veaiops/api-client' build && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/components' build && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/constants' build && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/types' build && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/utils' build && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/openapi-specs' build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter '@veaiops/api-client' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/components' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/constants' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/types' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/utils' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/openapi-specs' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/veaiops' test
scripts.test:packages: pnpm --filter '@veaiops/api-client' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/components' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/constants' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/types' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/utils' test && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/openapi-specs' test
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter '@veaiops/api-client' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/components' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/constants' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/types' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/utils' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/openapi-specs' clean && pnpm --filter '@veaiops/veaiops' clean
scripts.clean:node_modules: pnpm run clean:node_modules:packages && pnpm run clean:node_modules:apps && pnpm run clean:node_modules:root
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:node_modules && pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:cache
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('fs').copyFileSync('../.husky/pre-commit', '../.git/hooks/pre-commit'); require('fs').chmodSync('../.git/hooks/pre-commit', '755'); } catch (e) { console.log('Git hooks setup skipped:', e.message); }"
